message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $11500. This is a high-quality item worth more than its face value, and I believe this price reflects its true value while providing you with a great deal.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $10800 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its worth to me is no more than $10000.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and am willing to negotiate further. In light of that, I propose a price of $11000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your budget while still reflecting the value of the item.

I appreciate your revised offer, but I'm still trying to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $10500 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its worth to me is no more than $10000.

I see your point, Bob. Considering our previous discussions and the value you place on the product, I am willing to consider $10750 as the final price for the product. This allows us to reach an agreement that respects both our interests.
